Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I am UnionPacific1983WP. In case you can't tell by the name, I am a big fan of trains. Trains are my favorite mode of transportation, except for rockets, of course. I am glad to be a member of the Kerbal Space Program Forums.

Welcome UnionPacific!

We currently have a ['hype train](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114646-Unofficial-Official-1-0-Hype-Thread%21)' forum thread which is being very excited for the upcoming release of 1.0 and has a strong train theme.

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Glad to have you aboard.
I love trains too! Welcome aboard!
Welcome to the positive side in the number war! And congrats on getting your post approved so quickly: I lost some FG b/c of my CG moniker.

All aboard the KSP forums!

We have a great community over here!

You can visit the Spacecraft exchange to get craft, the Fan Works to see stories and Mission Reports, or stop by Game play Questions and Tutorials to find out more!

Have fun here, and tell us when you get to orbit or the Mun (if you haven't yet).

Enjoy!

DMSP
